/* collab.tmpl.addTmplProject */ INSERT INTO COLLAB_TMPL_PROJECT ( TMPLSEQ, tmplName , CompanyCode, TmplKind , StartDate, EndDate, PrjColor, Remark, RegisterCode, RegisteDate, ModifierCode, ModifyDate) (SELECT COLLAB_TMPL_PROJECT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, a.requestTitle,#{CompanyCode}, a.TmplKind, b.StartDate, b.EndDate, b.PrjColor, b.Remark, #{USERID}, SYSDATE, #{USERID}, SYSDATE FROM COLLAB_TMPL_REQUEST A JOIN COLLAB_PROJECT B on a.PrjSeq = B.PrjSeq WHERE a.RequestSeq = #{requestSeq})
SELECT COLLAB_TMPL_PROJECT_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL

/* collab.tmpl.addTmplProjectUserform */ INSERT INTO COLLAB_TMPL_PROJECT_USERFORM (PRJUSERFORMSEQ, tmplSeq, optionTitle, optionType, optionVal, sortKey, RegisterCode, RegisteDate, ModifierCode, ModifyDate ) (SELECT COLLAB_TMPL_USERFORM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{tmplSeq}, optionTitle, optionType, optionVal, sortKey, #{USERID}, SYSDATE, #{USERID}, SYSDATE FROM COLLAB_PROJECT_USERFORM WHERE prjSeq = #{prjSeq})

/* collab.tmpl.addTmplProjectSection */ INSERT INTO COLLAB_TMPL_SECTION ( SECTIONSEQ, tmplSeq, SectionName, RegisterCode, RegisteDate, ModifierCode, ModifyDate) (SELECT COLLAB_TMPL_SECTION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{tmplSeq}, SectionName, #{USERID}, SYSDATE, #{USERID}, SYSDATE FROM COLLAB_SECTION WHERE prjSeq = #{prjSeq})

/* collab.tmpl.addTmplProjectTask */ INSERT INTO COLLAB_TMPL_TASK ( TASKSEQ, tmplSeq, taskName , sectionSeq, StartDate, EndDate, Label, ParentKey, TopParentKey, TaskStatus, ProgRate, CloseDate, ObjectType, ObjectID, Remark, RegisterCode, RegisteDate, ModifierCode, ModifyDate) (SELECT COLLAB_TMPL_TASK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{tmplSeq}, b.taskName, d.sectionSeq, StartDate, EndDate, Label, ParentKey, TopParentKey, TaskStatus, ProgRate, CloseDate, ObjectType, ObjectID, Remark, #{USERID}, SYSDATE, #{USERID}, SYSDATE FROM COLLAB_TASK_MAP a JOIN COLLAB_TASK b ON A.taskSeq = b.taskSeq JOIN COLLAB_SECTION c ON a.prjSeq = c.prjSeq AND a.prjType = c.prjType AND a.SectionSeq = c.SectionSeq JOIN COLLAB_TMPL_SECTION d ON d.tmplSeq = #{tmplSeq} AND d.SectionName = c.SectionName WHERE a.prjSeq = #{prjSeq} AND a.prjType = 'P' AND b.ParentKey = 0)
